definition: (originally) to provide assistance/(more recently) to show one's support (for a singing idol etc)
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
surname Ying
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to help/to assist/to aid

sentences.english: The funds will be used to support and purchase server and gifts.
sentences.chinese: 资金用于应援，服务器，礼物购置。

sentences.english: Do not organise events that violate fire-safety regulations. ie Don't burn the concert down.
sentences.chinese: 请不要组织违反防火条例的应援活动。

sentences.english: Let us do the best to be brothers SJ aid bar.
sentences.chinese: 让我们做SJ哥哥们最好的应援吧。

sentences.english: All we want is that show you the music support of "pure sapphire" .
sentences.chinese: 只是想为咱们所爱的人做“纯宝蓝色”的音乐应援。
